lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "This is a start -- and I venture to say a good one," the Treasury Secretary said, and he urged the audience of Western and Latin finance officials and bankers to stand fast against suggestions of solutions like debt relief.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Elsewhere in his speech, Baker outlined the progress industrial nations are making in promoting moderate global growth, low inflation and efforts to reduce massive trade imbalances.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "I believe the commercial banks need to be open to creative ideas for reducing the debt burden," Baker told the annual meeting of the Inter-American Development Bank.
